original_text:
You lift me up on the wind; you make me ride on it,
    and you toss me about in the roar of the storm.
korean_text: 나를 바람 위에 들어 불려가게 하시며 무서운 힘으로 나를 던져 버리시나이다

sentences.original_text: You lift me up on the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서는 바람 위로 나를 들어 올리시고

sentences.original_text: you make me ride on it
and you toss me about in the roar of the storm.
